[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Agracores mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1716979038
- Added 4x recipies for fine and lavish survival meal - Replaced the old xml-defs with patching to avoid overwrite vanilla definitions for meal and stoves - Added stack-version of the meal-icon, the same as vanilla behaviour - Removed the extra thought-definitions since they were identical to the normal "ate fine/lavish meal" in terms of values - If ideology is loaded there are also vegetarian and carnivore variants - Updated the graphics to make them more distinct

Mod Version: 1.2
A simple mod that adds different quality tiers for packaged survival meals, just like normal meals.
Features include:
[h1] SIMPLE SURVIVAL MEAL [/h1] [img] https://imgur.com/eaMESi9.png [/img] (replaces normal survival meal)
[b] Work to make : [u]300[/u] [/b] [b] Value : [u]15[/u] [/b] [b] Nutrition : [u]0.9[/u] [/b]
[h1] FINE SURVIVAL MEAL [/h1] [img] https://imgur.com/eleUy2e.png [/img]
[b] Work to make : [strike]450[/strike] [u]600[/u] [/b] [b] Value : [strike]20[/strike] [u]32[/u] [/b] [b] Nutrition : [u]0.9[/u] [/b] [b] Taste thought : ate fine survival meal +5 [/b]
[h1] LAVISH SURVIVAL MEAL [/h1] [img] https://imgur.com/1iev3u9.png [/img]
[b] Work to make : [strike]800[/strike] [u]1100[/u] [/b] [b] Value : [strike]40[/strike] [u]64[/u] [/b] [b] Nutrition : [u]1.0[/u] [/b] [b] Taste thought : ate lavish survival meal +12 [/b]
(Values, Nutrition, and Work Amount are based directly from the in-game meal classes)
[b] Should work with just about anything and with old saves [/b] [b] If you do find a problem let me know! [/b]
[h1] SUPPORTED LANGUAGES [/h1] [list] [*]Chinese (traditional) by tubfan [/list]
--Change Log--
*1.1: Changed taste thought. (shout out to Deyon for the idea)
*1.2: Added Chinese (traditional) language support by tubfan
